reward.description.Freeplay.Uninterrupte.translation: Let Cozmo explore uninterrupted for 5 minutes

reward.description.Freeplay.CompleteBeha.translation: completing the 'Pounce On Fingers' behavior successfully
completing the 'Knock Over Stacks' behavior successfully
completing the 'Build a Pyramid' behavior successfully
completing the 'Pop a Wheelie' behavior successfully

reward.description.QuickTap.Played.translation: Played a game of Quick Tap

reward.description.QuickTap.WinGame.OneC.translation: Won a game of Quick Tap in 'One Color' mode

reward.description.QuickTap.WinGame.TwoC.translation: Won a game of Quick Tap in 'Two Colors' mode

reward.description.QuickTap.WinGame.Thre.translation: Won a game of Quick Tap in 'Three Colors' mode

reward.description.QuickTap.WinGame.Four.translation: Won a game of Quick Tap in 'Four Colors' mode

reward.description.QuickTap.Accuracy.50.translation: Finished a game of Quick Tap with tap accuracy >50%

reward.description.QuickTap.Accuracy.75.translation: Finished a game of Quick Tap with tap accuracy >75%

reward.description.QuickTap.Accuracy.100.translation: Finished a game of Quick Tap with 100% tap accuracy!

reward.description.QuickTap.Shutout.Sing.translation: Won a round of Quick Tap 5 to 0

reward.description.QuickTap.Shutout.TwoR.translation: Won two rounds of Quick Tap 5 to 0

reward.description.QuickTap.RedCubes.Nev.translation: Never tapped on a red cube!

reward.description.QuickTap.TieBreaker.O.translation: Won a round of Quick Tap after being tied 4-4

reward.description.QuickTap.TieBreaker.T.translation: Won two rounds of after being tied 4-4

reward.description.Keepaway.Shutout.translation: Won a game of Keepaway 5 to 0

reward.description.Keepaway.NoFakes.translation: Finished a game of Keepaway without ever getting faked out.

reward.description.Explorer.Time.5.translation: Played Explorer Mode for longer than 5 minutes

reward.description.Explorer.Time.10.translation: Played Explorer Mode for longer than 10 minutes

reward.description.Explorer.Time.20.translation: Played Explorer Mode for longer than 20 minutes
